TopicTitle: Knievel Kerman VAB LEAP OF FIRE!

Articles.Content:
Knievel Kerman returns in his most requested video!

I gave people the option of whether he should leap a building, or through a ring of fire.

The overwhelming response was that he should do both, at the same time. I hate that those people were probably right. They also suggested it should be the VAB. I hate THOSE people even more.

It took a lot of fiddling, calculations, trial and error and a whole load of mods.

But here it is.

Enjoy!
WOW! That must have cost you days Awesome!
how did you do that animated board? is it green or am i missing something....
Amazing job! I can only imagine how tough it must have been to get everything figured out as accurately as we saw here. Rep coming your way, master of the VAB.

how did you do that animated board? is it green or am i missing something....

The board is just a normal wing. The animated screen was added in frame by frame during video editing.

Amazing job! I can only imagine how tough it must have been to get everything figured out as accurately as we saw here. Rep coming your way, master of the VAB.

I was tempted to put together a video of the fails. It would have been longer than the Hobbit trilogy though, and I missed a great one where the VAB exploded for some reason but the ring of fire survived and was burning away in the smouldering wreck!
